county_fips and state_fips data based on the "2019 State, County, Minor Civil Division, and Incorporated Place FIPS Codes" dataset available at https://www.census.gov/geographies/reference-files/2019/demo/popest/2019-fips.html. Dataset downloaded on December 3, 2020.

ISO country codes retrieved from https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html on Feb_25_2021

UN country region codes retrieved from https://unece.org/trade/cefact/UNLOCODE-Download on Feb_25_2021
